factions/arstir_industries.html.title: Faction: Arstir Industries
factions/arstir_industries.html.blurb: Arstir Industries is the largest conglomerate on Earth. The principal divisions of the compare are *space, transport and colonisation* (Arstir Frontiers) and *security and defence* (Arstir Security). The company is a prominent maker of space vessels, both for military and civilian use.  Invention of FTL Arstir industries revolutionised space...
